rukus.text: Osʹ lytsemiry y ti, v chyyikh sertsyakh khvoroba, skazaly: «Zvabyla yikh relihiya yikhnya!» Ale yakshcho khtosʹ pokladayetʹsya na Allaha, to, voistynu, Allah — Vsemohutniy, Mudryy
Yakby ty bachyv, yak anhely zabyrayutʹ neviruyuchykh! Vony bʺyutʹ yikh po oblychchyu ta spynakh: «Skushtuyte palyuchoyi kary
Tse vam za te, shcho zrobyly ruky vashi. Voistynu, Allah ne chynytʹ nespravedlyvo z rabamy!»
Tak samo chynyv rid Firauna y ti, yaki zhyly pered nymy. Vony ne poviryly v znamennya Allaha, tozh Allah skhopyv yikh za hrikhy yikhni! Voistynu, Allah — sylʹnyy ta suvoryy u pokaranni
Tse tak, bo Allah ne zminyuye Svoyeyi mylosti, danoyi yakomusʹ narodu, poky vony ne zminyatʹ toho, shcho v yikhnikh dushakh. Voistynu Allah — Vsechuyuchyy i Vseznayuchyy

Tak samo chynyv rid Firauna y ti, yaki zhyly pered nymy. Vony spryynyaly yak brekhnyu znamennya Hospoda svoho, tozh My znyshchyly yikh za hrikhy yikhni, a rid Firauna My vtopyly! Usi vony buly nechestyvtsyamy
Voistynu, nayhirshi z tvorinʹ pered Allahom — tse ti, yaki ne uviruvaly y ne uviruyutʹ
ti, z yakymy ty ukladayesh dohovir, a vony shchorazu porushuyutʹ yoho y ne boyatʹsya [Allaha]
Yakshcho ty ziydeshsya z nymy na viyni, to, pokaravshy yikh, nalyakay tykh, khto yikh pidtrymuye. Mozhlyvo, vony pamʺyatatymutʹ
Yakshcho ty boyishsya zrady z boku deyakykh lyudey, to rozirvy iz nymy [uhodu], shchob usi buly rivni. Voistynu, Allah ne lyubytʹ zradnykiv
